Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Glad we happened to walk by Sapori – while looking over the menu from the sidewalk customers inside were enthusiastically waving us in. Our waitress was very friendly and quickly welcomed us to our table. We ordered the spaghetti vongole, …

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Bright and inviting interior. Service for the day we went was excellent, a recently transplanted Italian who was very solicitous.  The lunch menu is mostly sandwiches and paninis, but he specially made salads for us.  Excellent food, great service.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: The food was pretty good. Staff was friendly. However one of our lasagnas was scorching hot, while another one was cold in the middle. Other than that, I really liked the ossobuco.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: used to be nice place with good lunch sandwiches and decent simple italian food in the evening. Now just after tourist money. Value for money is ridiculously low. Avoid at all costs!

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: This place has gone bad to worse. Weird menu and prices. Saw a rat in the kitchen. Would never visit again.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Freshly cooked food with generous portion. I can promise they do not reheat anything :)

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Take-away : small portions and expensive. Disappointing price/quality ratio.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Excellent services, good wine list and a wonderful spicy spaghetti.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Not a great selection in the menu and very small portions in the desserts.

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: Nice people, cheap and good food

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Eaten there with a group of 15 people, and we all feel ripped off. A menu price was agreed in advance by telephone. They did not remember that afterwards. In the end, an invoice of € 120.00 per person came out. …

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Well in advance contacted the restaurant whether it was possible to have dinner with 30 or 40 colleagues and whether they had a menu suggestion. Ultimately 25 people joined. They have provided us with excellent food …

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Friendly people who prepare food with care. That costs time and money: a medium sized sandwich (some will want two) usually costs more than 4 euros. But good ingredients. …

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious sandwiches eaten after Artis visit. Great ingredients. One of us got the wrong sandwich: it was quickly repaired and did not appear on the bill! …

Name: Sapori Del Mondo
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A restaurant that refuses to have customers at 8 pm because at 9 pm it closes the kitchen ........ bho ..... in a tourist destination ..... …
